member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual
member.summary: Represents an Individual i.e. an instance of some class in an ontology.

remarks.para: See Using the Ontology API for some informal documentation on the use of the Ontology namespace.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.#ctor(VDS.RDF.INode,VDS.RDF.IGraph)
member.summary: Gets an Individual from the Graph.
member.remarks: Requires that an individual (a resource which is the subject of at least one triple where the predicate is rdf:type) is already present in the Graph.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.#ctor(VDS.RDF.INode,VDS.RDF.INode,VDS.RDF.IGraph)
member.summary: Gets/Creates an Individual from the Graph.
member.param: Class to create/add the Individual to.
member.remarks: Allows for creating new Individuals in the Graph or adding existing resources to another Class. If the resource for the Individual or the given Class are new then they will be added to the Graph.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.IntialiseClasses
member.summary: Helper method which finds all the Types given for this Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.Classes
member.summary: Gets all the Classes that this resource belongs to.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.HasClass(VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyClass)
member.summary: Gets whether the Individual belongs to a specific class.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.HasClass(VDS.RDF.INode)
member.summary: Gets whether the Individual belongs to a class identified by the given resource.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.Individual.HasClass(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets whether the Individual belongs to a class identified by the given URI.

member.summary: Gets the properties which have this class as a range.

member.summary: Gets whether something is a Top Class i.e. has no super classes.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyClass.IsBottomClass
member.summary: Gets whether something is a Bottom Class i.e. has no sub classes.

member.summary: Gets whether this Class is equal to another Class.

member.name: T:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyGraph
member.summary: Represents a Graph with additional methods for extracting ontology based information from it.

remarks.para: See Using the Ontology API for some informal documentation on the use of the Ontology namespace.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyGraph.#ctor(VDS.RDF.IRefNode,VDS.RDF.INodeFactory,VDS.RDF.IUriFactory,VDS.RDF.BaseTripleCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new Ontology Graph.
member.param: The name to assign to the graph.
The factory to use when constructing nodes in this graph. If null, defaults to a new instance using the same UriFactory instance as this graph.
The factory to use when constructing URIs in this graph. If null, default to the root UriFactory.
The initial content of the graph. If null, the graph will initially be empty.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyGraph.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a new Ontology Graph with the specified URI as the graph name.
member.param: The graph name as a URI.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyGraph.#ctor(VDS.RDF.IRefNode,VDS.RDF.BaseTripleCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new Ontology Graph with the specified name and initial content
member.param: The name to assign to the graph.
The initial content of the graph.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyGraph.#ctor(System.Uri,VDS.RDF.BaseTripleCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new Ontology Graph with the specified name and initial content
member.param: The name to assign to the graph.
The initial content of the graph.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.Label
member.summary: Gets the Label(s) for the Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.SeeAlso
member.summary: Gets the See Also(s) for the Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.SameAs
member.summary: Gets the Same As('s) for the Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.IsDefinedBy
member.summary: Gets the Is Defined By(s) for the Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.DifferentFrom
member.summary: Gets the Different From(s) for the Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.Types
member.summary: Gets the rdf:type's for the Resource.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.TriplesWithSubject
member.summary: Gets all the Triples from the Graph where the Resource occurs as the Subject.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.TriplesWithObject
member.summary: Gets all the Triples from the Graph where the Resource occurs as the Object.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.TriplesWithPredicate
member.summary: Gets all the Triples from the Graph where the Resource occurs as the Predicate.

member.name: P:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.Triples
member.summary: Gets all the Triples where the Resource occurs in any position.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.ToString
member.summary: Gets the String representation of the Resource.
member.remarks: This is either the first label (if any are declared) or the string representation of the INode that this resource wraps.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.AsClass
member.summary: Casts a Resource into an Ontology Class.
member.remarks: Anything may be cast to a regardless of whether it actually represents a class in the ontology.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.AsProperty
member.summary: Casts a Resource into an Ontology Property.
member.remarks: Anything may be cast to a regardless of whether it actually represents a property in the ontology.

member.name: M:VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource.op_Explicit(VDS.RDF.Ontology.OntologyResource)~VDS.RDF.Graph
member.summary: Casts a Resource into a Graph.
member.remarks: Equivalent to doing a SPARQL DESCRIBE query on this resource.
